item.description:
This is one of Boston's hottest parties! We have been sold out of this event the last 3 years!

Event is designed for singles and couples who want to have fun on Valentines with friends in style Please get your tickets early! Prices will go up every week!
TICKETS AVAILABLE @ DOOR
We bring you Boston's most successful desi parties. Your and our favorites DJ JAY & DJ MAYUR will be rocking the best Bollywood, Bhangra, desi hits all night long!!


DJ JAY & DJ MAYUR- PLAYING TODAYS HOTTEST BOLLYWOOD, REMIX, BHANGRA MUSIC ALL NIGHT LONG
+ Doors open 10:00 pm. Party till 2:00 am. The music only gets hotter as the night goes on! DANCE ALL NIGHTT!!!

+ Valentines Décor & party favors
+ SVEDVA VODKA PHOTO BOOTH!
+ SPECIAL GOLGAPPA SHOTS

+ Professional onsite photographer for the attendees!

+ Complimentary Appetizers for the first 1 hour!

+ 200 plus people expected. This is going to be one of Boston's hottest party!

+ Discount's available for group rates! VIP Tables available at extra price! @ 617-633-5975

+ Reasonable prices on drinks!
+ The ONLY DESI VALENTINES THEME EVENT IN BOSTON!!

Strict Dress code: NO CAPS, NO SNEAKERS, DRESS TO IMPRESS

Admission:
$10= General Admission,
$16= COUPLES ADMISSION'

25% off with promo code DISCOUNT25
item.why: THE BEST VALENTINES EVENT IN BOSTON, TOP DESI DJS PLAYING HOTTEST DESI BEATS, EXPECTED TO BE SOLD OUT CHECK IT OUT AT WWW.ISHQ.EVENTBRITE.COM 25% OFF WITH PROMO CODE: DISCOUNT25, EVENT IS FOR SINGLES AS WELL,
item.name: ISHQ BOLLYWOOD BHANGRA VALENTINES PARTY
